vclaim: The ashes of actor James Doohan, who played chief engineer Montgomery Scott on the hit "Star Trek" television series, were smuggled aboard the International Space Station by private astronaut Richard Garriott.
title: Were Ashes of ‘Star Trek’ Star Smuggled onto Space Station?
subtitle: The man who played Montgomery “Scotty” Scott on the hit sci-fi series may have made it to space after all.
author: Nur Ibrahim
